overview: From 2026-01-07 to 2026-01-08, elizaos-plugins/plugin-discord had 1 new PRs (0 merged), 0 new issues, and 2 active contributors.

topIssues.title: join and leave slash commands went away
topIssues.author: odilitime
topIssues.body: We used to have them and now they're gone

topPRs.title: fix: use handleMessage instead of sendMessage for elizaOS unified API
topPRs.author: standujar
topPRs.body:
Greptile Overview

### Greptile Summary This PR updates the Discord plugin to use the new `handleMessage` method instead of the deprecated `sendMessage` method in the elizaOS unified messaging API. The changes are clean and complete: - Updated the `UnifiedMessagingAPI` interface definition to use `handleMessage` - Updated the runtime check function `hasUnifiedMessagingAPI` to detect the new method - Updated the actual API call in `messages.ts` to invoke `handleMessage` - Updated documentation comments to reflect the new method name The PR also includes formatting changes (single to double quotes) that appear to be from an auto-formatter. All changes are backward compatible since they only affect the new unified API path, with fallbacks to `messageService` and event-based handling still intact. ### Confidence Score: 5/5 - This PR is safe to merge with no risk - it's a straightforward method rename that aligns with the updated elizaOS API - The changes are minimal, focused, and complete. All three required updates (interface definition, runtime check, and API call) are present and correct. The PR maintains backward compatibility through existing fallback mechanisms for older core versions. No logic changes were introduced, only a method name update. - No files require special attention

Important Files Changed

File Analysis | Filename | Score | Overview | |----------|-------|----------| | src/messages.ts | 5/5 | Updated unified API call from `sendMessage` to `handleMessage` at line 455, aligning with the new interface definition | | src/utils.ts | 5/5 | Updated `UnifiedMessagingAPI` interface and `hasUnifiedMessagingAPI` function to use `handleMessage` instead of deprecated `sendMessage`, includes formatting changes (quote style) |

Sequence Diagram

```mermaid sequenceDiagram participant Discord as Discord Message participant MM as MessageManager participant Utils as getUnifiedMessagingAPI() participant Runtime as IAgentRuntime participant UnifiedAPI as elizaOS.handleMessage participant MsgService as messageService.handleMessage participant Callback as HandlerCallback Discord->>MM: handleMessage(message) MM->>MM: processMessage() MM->>MM: buildMemoryFromMessage() MM->>Utils: getUnifiedMessagingAPI(runtime) Utils->>Runtime: Check elizaOS.handleMessage exists alt Unified API Available (NEW) Runtime-->>Utils: elizaOS.handleMessage found Utils-->>MM: Return UnifiedMessagingAPI MM->>UnifiedAPI: handleMessage(agentId, message, {onResponse: callback}) UnifiedAPI->>Callback: Execute callback with content Callback->>Discord: Send response to channel else MessageService Available Runtime-->>Utils: messageService found Utils-->>MM: Return null, check messageService MM->>MsgService: handleMessage(runtime, message, callback) MsgService->>Callback: Execute callback with content Callback->>Discord: Send response to channel else Legacy Event-based Runtime-->>Utils: Neither available Utils-->>MM: Return null MM->>Runtime: emitEvent(MESSAGE_RECEIVED) Runtime->>Callback: Execute callback with content Callback->>Discord: Send response to channel end ``` ## Summary by CodeRabbit * **Refactor** * Refined the unified messaging interface to a new public API surface, improving consistency of message handling. * **Chores** * Bumped package version to 1.3.7. ✏️ Tip: You can customize this high-level summary in your review settings.
